description.value:
Cold

Aura 2

Each square within the aura costs enemies 1 extra square of movement to enter.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Reach 3

+23 vs AC; 2d6+7 damage plus 2d6 cold damage, plus 2d6 cold damage on an opportunity attack or against an immobilized target.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 2d6+7 damage, and the target is pulled 2 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Chillreaver makes a bite attack and a claw attack.

Recharge 6

Ranged 10

+22 vs Fortitude; 2d6+7 cold damage, ongoing 10 cold damage, and the target is immobilized and dazed (save ends all). Aftereffect: The target is slowed until the end of Chillreaver's next turn.

Recharge 6

Close blast 5

+21 vs Reflex; 6d6+7 cold damage, and the target is immobilized and dazed (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is slowed until the end of Chillreaver's next turn.

Encounter âœ¦ Cold

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Chillreaver's breath weapon recharges, and he uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Chillreaver's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Chillreaver can make opportunity attacks against all enemies within his reach (3 squares).

Chillreaver rolls initiative twice, and receives two full turns during a round. He rolls for recharge on each of his turns. Each time Chillreaver becomes dazed or stunned, or suffers from an effect that has the charm keyword, that effect ends at the end of his next turn.

Cha 14 (+10)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +15, Athletics +24Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 21 | Insight 21
